name: Endless Temple Run
description:
Join the most dangerous and thrilling running princess game, road to temple.

Crazy smash hit Endless Run Temple Legend game ready to play on any android mobile!

Your mission is to recover the lost gold missing somewhere in temple jungle.

Join Ava and the rest in this endless run oz, keep running to survive from temple legend monster.

Run across jungle, castle and many other beautiful scene to find all the missing gold.

rush out of the dangerous jungle temple before the dead awaken, be a temple hero in this land of gold. Endless fun infinite runner game
